name: vic wiseman
detailedDescription:
Vic's one of our support team on the customer-facing front line.
'Receptionist' is an understatement for what she does.
On top of dealing with all visitors, parcels, deliveries and random requests, she also provides telephone support for our customers.

missions.name: talktovic
missions.description: Vic needs you to sign in.

reward.message:
Vic Places a large visitors book on the desk.
'If you can just sign in here for the day we can sort you out with access to the remainder of the building.'

inventory.name: visitors book
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like you're the first newcomer today.

attributes.defaultResult: It needs to stay down here on reception.

missions.name: vicsbook
missions.displayName: give Vic something interesting to read
missions.description: Things are pretty quiet down here today and Vic looks bored. I reckon she'd appreciate something interesting to read.

reward.message:
Congratulations. Vic likes the book.

'Thanks $player!'
'If you ever need help tracking anything down, just pop down and ask me and I'll see what I can do.'
